Container.Name: wh-umami
Container.Overview: Umami is a simple, fast, privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics.
Container.Requires: Umami requires: - A PostgreSQL or MySQL/MariaDB database.

Config.Name: Umami web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port Umami listens on.

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: The database connection URL, e.g. postgres://USER:PASS@HOST:PORT/DATABASE

Config.Name: APP_SECRET
Config.Description: A unique value for your installation.

Config.Name: CLIENT_IP_HEADER
Config.Description: HTTP header to check for the client's IP address.

Config.Name: TRACKER_SCRIPT_NAME
Config.Description: Allows you to assign a custom name to the tracker script different from the default.

Config.Name: DISABLE_LOGIN
Config.Description: Disables the login page for the application.

Config.Name: DISABLE_UPDATES
Config.Description: Disables the check for new versions of Umami.

Config.Name: DISABLE_TELEMETRY
Config.Description: Umami collects completely anonymous telemetry data in order help improve the application.
